note: Hi, I'm Casey, and I use It/It/Its pronouns. I like tabletop RPGs, board games, kink & queer stuff, socialism, kindness, books, art, video games, cats, snakes, spiders, hiking, caves, abolishing ICE, abolishing the police, abolishing war, abolishing capitalism, building community safety systems that do not rely on the police state, doing mutual aid, learning, teaching, science, math, history when it's honest and not the fake BS they teach in school, consent, boundaries, and collective care.
